```{r}

master_invert_inat = filter(master_inverts, source=="iNaturalist")

inat_order = table(master_invert_inat$order)
inat_order = as.data.frame(inat_order)

inat_class = table(master_invert_inat$class)
inat_class = as.data.frame(inat_class)

inat_iconic = rbind(inat_order, inat_class)
write_csv(inat_iconic, "inat_taxa_table.csv")
```
